sourcesContent:
import {useState } from "react"; import './Form.css' // Separar as options em um componente function Form () { const [color, setColor] = useState(''); const [transportation, setTransportation] = useState(''); const [setting, setSetting] = useState(''); const [naturalPhenomenon, setNaturalPhenomenon] = useState(''); const getFormData = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(color, transportation, setting, naturalPhenomenon) } const getSelectionValue = (e) => { console.log(e.target.name) if (e.target.name === 'color') { setColor(e.target.value); } else if (e.target.name === 'transportation') { setTransportation(e.target.value); } else if (e.target.name === 'setting') { setSetting(e.target.value); } else if (e.target.name === 'naturalPhenomenon') { setNaturalPhenomenon(e.target.value); } } return (
Choose you favorite color:
Choose a transportation:
Choose a setting:
Choose a natural phenomenon:
) } export default Form;
